divs: sighting detailslooking out towards the hudson river\west side of manhattan from the cliff in cliffside park, nj. saw a crisp controlled white light come out the sky so fast it made the planes and helicopters appear to be not moving. i would venture to say it was going at thousands of mph. it came down over 95th st area over nyc skyline. then the light turned off. 2 minutes later there was a flash\burst of light in the exact area in the sky where the object was last seen before the lights went off. there were no clouds in that area. there was no lightning that night although it did rain earlier that evening. but, the skies were very clear when this event occured. my location provides me a panoramic view of the nyc skyline at 1.5 mile away and 150 feet above sea level.
Summary: Fast White traveling light over NYC
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There was one other sighting in New York on or around October 27th 2010
